column1: Reasons why decreasing the cost is required
2. Didn’t know the cloud architecture better
Changes made to decrease the price
Most of the price involves is in processing and transferring of data.
Here processing part is not that much but transferring in requests is too much.
Once we realize that we have estimated more data transfer between client and the cloud, so decrease in the resources of Cloudfront and S3 brought down the total cost.
